Item.comments: automatically adds a top folder to Folder Template
Item.method_code:
'System.Diagnostics.Debugger.Break() ' called onBeforeAdd of "cFolder Template" If Me.getProperty("name","") <> "" And Me.getProperty("top_cfolder_id","") = "" Then
Dim newFolder As Item = Me.newItem("cFolder","add") newFolder.setProperty("name",Me.getProperty("name","")) newFolder.setProperty("permission_id","E2227109B19B45E0B4690EEE5E890FBB") ' permission: cFolder Template
newFolder.setProperty("is_template","1") newFolder = newFolder.apply()
If newFolder.isError() Then Return newFolder
Me.setProperty("top_cfolder_id",newFolder.GetID())
End If Return Me
Item.name: FolderTemplate AddNew Top Folder
